taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Classical Latin, from Greek kastanaion karuon, nut from Castania, probably referring either to Kastanaia in Pontus or Castana in Thessaly]

bio:treatment.discussion: Species ca. 8-10 (3 in the flora, often interpreted as 2):
As evidenced by United States breeding programs, all species are probably interfertile (including American × Asian species). Local morphologic intergradation between species is to be expected.
